lead_paragraph: Jimmy Hazen, who turned professional last September, shot a two-over-par 73 for a 54-hole total of 211 to win the New York State Open at Bethpage State Park’s windy Black Course in Farmingdale, N.Y.
snippet: Jimmy Hazen, who turned professional last September, shot a two-over-par 73 for a 54-hole total of 211 to win the New York State Open at Bethpage State Park’s windy Black Course in Farmingdale, N.Y.
